actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to increase the number of class C directors of Federal Reserve Banks.
short_title: Federal Reserve Bank Public Directors Act

summary.text: Federal Reserve Bank Public Directors Act - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to increase the number of directors of each Federal Reserve Bank from nine to twelve by adding three additional directors to the class of directors designated from the public by the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System.

titles.title: Federal Reserve Bank Public Directors Act
A bill to increase the number of class C directors of Federal Reserve Banks.
